scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d webapp_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run consumermarket npm db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run consumermarket npx knex migrate:down
scripts.docker:db:migrate:make: docker compose run consumermarket npx knex migrate:make
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build consumermarket && docker compose rm --force --stop consumermarket && docker compose up -d consumermarket
